title: Courtney Logan Kennedy Presents "Zoe"
description: Courtney Logan Kennedy is only six years old, but already she has more than her share of trouble. Her little brother Zack the Rat drives her crazy. Her teacher is out to get her. But worst of all, her Aunt Ginny is coming to babysit for two weeks! How could her summer get any worse? Courtney is in for a huge surprise though. She will find she is a special little girl with a big secret. She discovers that she has a soul mate named Zoe who will make an otherwise boring summer a lot more interesting. Between surfing with the mayor and keeping Zoeâ€™s pranks under control, Courtney will have no time to be bored. Will she be wanting her not-so-special life back or is Zoe truly the best friend she will ever have?
author: Renee Miller-Johnston
